import './Form.css' import React, { useState } from 'react' const Form = props =>{ const [currSavings,setCurrSavings] = useState(0); const [yearlySavings,setYearlySavings] = useState(0); const [expReturn,setExpReturn] = useState(0); const [duration,setDuration] = useState(0); const currSavingsHandler = event => { setCurrSavings(event.target.value); console.log(currSavings); } return (

) } export default Form;
